spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall room zoning roughly matches (kitchen/dining left, living center/top, bedrooms right, bath center-right, laundry bottom-left), but multiple layout deviations are present: several door openings are not in the same positions as the 2D plan and are modeled with incorrect curved shapes; closet areas do not match the 2D partitions; window counts/locations on exterior walls differ from the plan; and room proportions (notably bath/bedroom wing vs living/hall) appear distorted compared to the 2D footprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is partially preserved, but fidelity is reduced by missing/merged closet partitions, inconsistent wall thickness/door cut behavior, and multiple doorway placements/orientations that do not align with the plan. No clearly new full rooms are added, but several openings/partitions functionally change circulation compared to the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are present in the correct general rooms (dining table in kitchen/dining, seating in living, beds in bedrooms, tub in bath). However, placements and scales are not reliably aligned to the 2D plan (living seating arrangement and bedroom furniture positioning differ; some casework/fixture placements appear shifted), reducing mapping accuracy.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric-style render with generally good lighting and clarity. Camera is consistent with an isometric/axonometric look, geometry is mostly clean. Main aesthetic penalty is the unnatural curved/warped door openings (reads as modeling artifact) and minor proportional oddities that reduce architectural believability.

detected_errors.description: Closet partitions do not match the 2D plan: the closet near the bathroom/hall and the closet by the laundry appear missing, merged, or reconfigured compared to the labeled closets in the floor plan.
Door placements along the central hall/bedroom junction are shifted from the 2D plan (openings do not align to the same wall segments, changing circulation into the bedroom wing).
Several doors have incorrect orientation/hinge behavior compared to the 2D plan (swing direction and opening side not preserved).
Laundry entry door position does not cleanly match the 2D plan’s hall-to-laundry opening location.
Window placement/count differs on exterior walls (notably the long/top windows and left-side windows do not match the plan’s window locations and segmentation).
Proportion distortion: the bathroom/bedroom wing appears enlarged relative to the hall/living area compared to the 2D plan proportions, and some internal wall runs appear lengthened/shortened.
Hallucinated/extra interior elements not indicated in the 2D plan, such as an added desk/work-surface and/or miscellaneous built-ins in circulation spaces.
Rendering/modeling artifact: multiple door openings are modeled as curved/warped cutouts rather than planar doorways consistent with the 2D plan.
